message: Let's start with a fair share. I'll take 80, you get 20. What do you say?
I'll take a bit more, but still a fair share
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 50, you get 50. No more negotiations, just a 50/50 split.
I'll take a bit more, but still willing to compromise
I'll take a bit more, but still willing to give you a good share. You can't do better than this, right?
I'm getting closer to my target, but still willing to negotiate
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm getting a bit impatient. This is my last offer before I walk away.
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly smaller share than before
I'm not budging either. I'll take a slightly larger share, and we can finally settle this.
I'm not giving up, I'll take a larger share and hope you accept
I'm making a final offer. I'll take 70, and we can finally settle this. It's the best you'll get.
It's now or never, I'm taking the majority
